column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One member of our party ordered steak
column2: which was perfect once again. This time we also got the fried chicken
column3: which is surprisingly great! The best fried chicken I've had for sure. We also branched out with mashed potatoes this trip
column4: which were fantastic. Every part of the meal was delicious
column5: from the bread to the steak. I also opted for a cocktail this time
column7: which is am amazing gin drink.
